Steps.Message: Update at 01:16 - We're pleased to report that all power in the Lower Road area should now be restored. Our engineers have now safely connected a temporary generator, and these will be boosting the power while our engineers work on fully repairing the underground network equipment. Depending on what the issue is, it may take a few days for our engineers to plan in the work and make their repairs, but once this is completed safely the generator(s) can be removed, and network power will be resumed. If you'd like any further information, or if your power is not restored, please call us any time on 08003163105.

We became aware of a power cut at 15:54. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Steps.Message: All power in the area should be back on. We’re really sorry for any disruption this caused.
Steps.Name: Power restored

Logs.Comment: Update at 01:16 - We're pleased to report that all power in the Lower Road area should now be restored. Our engineers have now safely connected a temporary generator, and these will be boosting the power while our engineers work on fully repairing the underground network equipment. Depending on what the issue is, it may take a few days for our engineers to plan in the work and make their repairs, but once this is completed safely the generator(s) can be removed, and network power will be resumed. If you'd like any further information, or if your power is not restored, please call us any time on 08003163105.

UKPNIncident.PlannedIncidentReason: We're carrying out planned work in your area. For our engineers to carry it out safely they need to turn the power off. We're doing this work as it's essential to provide reliable electricity supplies to your area. We're sorry for any inconvenience caused and thank you for your patience.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
